comments.main: THE ABOVE main app/index.js ^ JS FILE IS UNUSED - RUN npm start TO RUN THE APP INSTEAD.

scripts.start: Sadly we can't add new lines to this monstrous one-line script, but causes problems if we do, so we just gotta live with it. (https://stackoverflow.com/a/36259070) (At least PostGraphile is configurable that way.) Subscriptions, ENHANCE! Need --cors (for now) to fix https://github.com/graphile/postgraphile/issues/84#issuecomment-285551029. MUST SPECIFY that you want the pg-simplify-inflector plugin: https://github.com/graphile/pg-simplify-inflector#usage. Also you can specify the username and password for the connection string in .postgraphilerc.js (to better separate configs) - SEE https://www.graphile.org/postgraphile/usage-cli/#rc-file-options
